channel.title: Comments for page "Big Ro Lvl. 2"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Big Ro Lvl. 2"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I cannot get this guy to drop Cobalt Dust. At all. I threw him in with the hoclaus and olmek, so that should have increased drop rate. He dropped 22 dust, and that was IT. how the hell am i supposed to farm dust when the drop rate is so low?!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: i just did a big math calculation, and no matter how you calculate it, unless there's another "2x Ally Drops" ally like olmek, then you CANNOT get 44. Also, any possibility TACOS is NOT the only day-based ally.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Right, I also got 22. Do not know why anyone told about 44 -_-

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: why would you get 44 dust anyway? in megamissions, he drops 11, and olmek makes that to 22. Don't know why anyone would say any ally drops two drops at once…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Sadly I don't know how to edit those boxes, otherwise I would. -.-
EDUT: Or rather more correctly, I don't know how to get a picture to replace it posted to the site in such a way I can attribute it to Big Ro as a drop picture, as is currently the case.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Right. So instead of the current "Ally drop (x2)!", maybe it could be reformatted to show that he drops one dust, not two?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The only person that has a chance of getting 44 drops is TACOS during TACO Tuesday with Olmek, unless there is like Dust Saturday or something that's been put in but otherwise unknown as of current.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Most likely only one cobalt dust drops normally, I'm pretty sure that with Olmek in team, I was getting 22 on a megamission, not 44.
